tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crops (
  crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  growth_characteristics TEXT,
  requirements TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE crop_categories (
  category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE crop_rotation (
  rotation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_id INT REFERENCES crops(crop_id),
  rotation_date DATE,
  notes TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE crops (crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY, crop_name VARCHAR(255), growth_period VARCHAR(100), water_requirement VARCHAR(100))
CREATE TABLE growth_characteristics (characteristic_id INT PRIMARY KEY, characteristic_name VARCHAR(255), description TEXT)
CREATE TABLE crop_categories (category_id INT PRIMARY KEY, category_name VARCHAR(255), crop_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crops(crop_id))
CREATE TABLE crop_requirements (requirement_id INT PRIMARY KEY, crop_id INT, water_requirement VARCHAR(100), FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crops(crop_id))

CREATE TABLE growth_characteristics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT NOT NULL,
    growth_rate DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    water_requirement VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crops(id)
);

CREATE TABLE crop_rotation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rotation_number INT NOT NULL,
    crop_id INT NOT NULL,
    previous_crop_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crops(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (previous_crop_id) REFERENCES crops(id)
);

CREATE TABLE crop_requirements (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT NOT NULL,
    nutrient_requirements VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    recommended_soil_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crops(id)
);
